properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

parameters.description: A page item target that is an animation, media, or mso. Can accept: PageItem, Graphic, Behavior or MediaItem.
parameters.name: dynamicTarget
delaySeconds
parameters.description: The time delay in seconds for a target. (Optional)
Initial values for properties of the new TimingTarget (Optional)
parameters.name: withProperties

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the TimingTarget.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the TimingTarget with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the TimingTargets within the specified range.

parameters.description: The TimingTarget, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: TimingTarget, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The TimingTarget, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: TimingTarget, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first TimingTarget in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last TimingTarget in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle TimingTarget in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the TimingTarget with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the TimingTarget that follows the desired TimingTarget.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the TimingTarget whose index follows the specified TimingTarget in the collection.

parameters.description: The TimingTarget whose index comes before the desired TimingTarget.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any TimingTarget in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every TimingTarget in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TimingTarget.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the TimingTarget with the specified index.
